quest.name: What a Tangled Web We Weave
journal: This Resistance fighter seems to be waiting for someone.
Use the firecrackers at the designated location.
Jump down into the cave and slay any gorged spinners that appear.
objectives: Use the firecrackers at the designated location.
Jump down into the cave and slay any gorged spinners that appear.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: You're one o' those adventurers, right? Always runnin' about offerin' help to those in need? Good, because I could certainly use some right about now.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: One of our new recruits was supposed to make a short patrol around the Comet's Tail, an' he should've been back at least a few bells ago. I want you to come with me an' make sure he's alright. Follow me.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text:
There you are. I found him, but it seems we've got another problem.
Go on, tell herhim what you told me.

dialogue.name: YOUNGSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: R-Right. I was making my rounds, as I always do, when I was assaulted by a group of giant spiders! I panicked and ran, but in my haste I dropped my satchel, which contained a rather important set of documents.

dialogue.name: YOUNGSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: I came back here to retrieve them, but...the spiders... <shudder> They took the bag and went down into that rather large hole over there. I meant to go after them, but I considered having to fight them off in the dark, and soon thought better of it.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: I think I know how to flush 'em out. They don't take too kindly to loud noises. Here, take a few o' these firecrackers an' toss 'em down there.

dialogue.name: YOUNGSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: ...Legs... So many legs...

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: Those fireworks are sure to flush the bastards out o' hiding.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The firecrackers snap and pop as they fall into the hole.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: Used all of 'em? Good.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: When the spiders skitter out into the open, that'll be your chance to strike. You'll need to be quick. Otherwise they're like to retreat to the shadows. If you jump down, you can get the drop on 'em.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To flush the gorged spinners out of hiding, you must jump down to the designated location while dismounted.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: If you jump down quick, you can strike before they can skitter back to the shadows.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To flush the gorged spinners out of hiding, you must jump down to the designated location while dismounted.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You see no sign of spiders, but you can feel their eyes upon you. Perhaps you should jump down from above and take them by surprise.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: Holy hells, I didn't think you'd actually do it!

dialogue.name: YOUNGSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: That was incredible! Thank you, misssir. Now we can go and retrieve my satchel.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: Ahem. Well, there's no need to rush. It's been a long day, an' I'm sure the satchel's not goin' anywhere. For now let's head back to Castrum Oriens where I can give you proper thanks.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: Thanks again for your help. All that's left is to go an' retrieve those documents, an' hopefully forget all this ever happened.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: You see, this isn't the first time I've dealt with those spiders. I was born an' raised in these parts, an' I've hunted more than my fair share o' those eight-legged nightmares in my time. It's why I knew to use those firecrackers.

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: East End used to be teemin' with 'em, an' I thought we'd wiped 'em all out. <sigh> Apparently not...

dialogue.name: OLDSOLDIER02642
dialogue.text: I can only hope this doesn't mean we've got an infestation on our hands. If more o' those things start turnin' up again, you can bet I'll be ready.
